title: Electric Car Charging Stations, Gas Range, Clubhouse, Dishwasher
posting_body: 12257 Heritage Springs Dr., Santa Fe Springs, CA, 90670
This is a 2 Bedroom, 2 Bath, approximately 1072 Sq.
Welcome to Miro Apartments where you'll find elements of modern living and sophistication blended together to give you a Home you’ll love

Located just inside the gated Villages of Santa Fe Springs offering Hard Flooring, Washer and Dryer in-unit, Stainless Steel Appliances, Kitchen Islands, Nest Thermostats, En-Suite Bathrooms in select Homes, and Assigned Parking.
Visit "liveatMiro" to take a virtual tour of your new home.
Here, contemporary luxury is green and sustainable, and you’ll benefit from the connected, mobile lifestyle you expect.
And LA and Orange County are just minutes away via the freeway.

Restricted breeds include: Alaskan Malamute, Boxer, Chow Chow, Dalmatian, Doberman Pinscher, German Sheperd, Belgian Malinois, Husky Breeds, Stafforshire Terrier, Presa Canario, Rottweiler and Wolf Hybrids
